      • takeScreenshotAsFile

        @API(status=STABLE,
     since="Project-Template-v2.0.0",
     consumers={})
public static java.io.File takeScreenshotAsFile()
        Takes a screenshot of the current thread's active WebDriver. Works even when the WebDriver is headless. Usage: 
        
 FileUtils.copyFile(DriverManager.takeScreenshotAsFile(), screenshotLocation);
        Returns:
        The bytes containing the screenshot taken.

      • takeScreenshotAsBytes

        @API(status=STABLE,
     since="Project-Template-v2.0.0",
     consumers={})
public static byte[] takeScreenshotAsBytes()
        Takes a screenshot of the current thread's active WebDriver. Works even when the WebDriver is headless.
        Returns:
        The bytes containing the screenshot taken.

      • getCookieByName

        @API(status=STABLE,
     since="Project-Template-v2.0.0",
     consumers={})
public static java.lang.String getCookieByName​(java.lang.String cookieName)
        Get the value of a cookie given it's name.
        Parameters:
        cookieName - The name of the cookie as shown in the DevConsole under the Application tab.
        Returns:
        The value that the cookie contained.

      • sleep

        @API(status=STABLE,
     since="Project-Template-v2.0.0",
     consumers={})
public static void sleep​(long timeInMilliseconds)
        A dumb sleep. Avoid using where possible. Mostly for testing purposes.
        Parameters:
        timeInMilliseconds - The amount of time in milliseconds to wait before continuing code execution.
